mapper.insert: INSERT detail_dentist ( ID, PASSWD, NAME, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS3, PHONE ) VALUES ( #{ID}, #{PASSWD}, #{NAME}, #{ADDRESS1}, #{ADDRESS2}, #{ADDRESS3}, #{PHONE} )

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( BOARD_IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREA_ID ) VALUES ( #{BOARD_IDX}, #{ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME}, #{STORED_FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_SIZE}, 'Admin' )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET HIT_CNT = HIT_CNT + 1 WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, HIT_CNT, CREA_ID, CREA_DTM, TITLE, CONTENTS FROM TB_BOARD WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
